Question: Zhejiang Lante Optics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zhejiang Lante Optics Co., Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Manufactures and sells optical products including prisms, lenses, windows, and filters
- Offers coatings, molded micro aspherical products, mini prisms, and miniature glass spherical/aspheric lenses
- Provides car rearview mirrors, logo projection lamps, and car lenses, as well as substrate, carrier, packaged, through hole, and lithography wafers
- Produces micro prisms, small lenses, PBS prisms, etching glasses, and imaging glass aspherical lens
- Supplies products for telescopes, microscopes, mobile phones, AR/VR products, digital cameras, security monitors, multimedia projectors, and automobile interior and exterior decorations
Summary_cn:
浙江兰特光学有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点：

- 制造和销售包括棱镜、透镜、窗户和滤光片在内的光学产品
- 提供涂层、模压微非球面产品、小棱镜和微型玻璃球面/非球面透镜
- 提供汽车后视镜、标志投影灯和汽车透镜，以及基片、载体、封装、穿孔和光刻晶片
- 生产微型棱镜、小型透镜、PBS棱镜、腐蚀玻璃和成像玻璃非球面透镜
- 为望远镜、显微镜、手机、AR/VR产品、数码相机、安防监控器、多媒体投影仪和汽车内外装饰产品提供供应
